Title: Provides additional protections for sensitive health information and requires patients to have the right to restrict the disclosures of such patient's health information
Summary: Provides additional protections for sensitive health information and requires all health information networks, electronic health record systems, and health care providers to provide patients with a right to restrict the disclosures of such patient's health information; defines terms; provides for exceptions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to providing additional protections for sensitive health information and requiring all health information networks, electronic health record systems, and health care providers to provide patients with a right to restrict the disclosures of such patient's health information
